author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thudiyalur All Women Police have arrested farm labourer V. Lakshmanan (20) of Dindigul on the charge of raping another farm labourer’s daughter, a 16-year-old girl, at his house in a farm near Nellithurai.

The police said that when the girl’s parents were away at work, Lakshmanan followed the girl, threatened and forcibly took her to his house and raped her there.

The incident came to light when the girl narrated the incident to her parents who then lodged a complaint with them, the police said and added that they had registered a case and arrested him after doctors confirmed rape. The police also produced him before a magistrate and sent him to judicial custody.
title: Man held on rape charge
